import React from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { login } from '../actions' import { Table, Button, Form, Modal, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' class CartPage extends React.Component { renderTHead = () => { return ( No Name Image Size Price Quantity Total Action ) } renderTBody = () => { return ( {this.props.cart.map((item, index) => { if (this.state.selectedindex === index) { return ( {index + 1} {item.name} {item.size} IDR {item.price.toLocaleString()}
this.changeQty(e)} value={this.state.newQty} min={0} />
IDR {(this.state.newQty * item.price).toLocaleString()} ) } return ( {index + 1} {item.name} {item.size} IDR {item.price.toLocaleString()} {item.quantity} IDR {item.total.toLocaleString()} ) })} ) } render() { const { reqPayment, reqPass, errPass, errPayment, cartEmpty, toHistory } = this.state if (!this.props.id) return if (toHistory) return return (

this.setState({ reqPayment: false })}> Payment this.setState({ errPayment: false })}> Error! Make Sure Your Cart Is Not Empty!
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { cart: state.login.cart, id: state.login.id, pass: state.login.password, username: state.login.username } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { login })(CartPage)
